english_text: The best of you are those who learn the Quran and teach it

arabic_text: الزكاة قنطرة الإسلام فمن أداها فقد قطع القنطرة ومن منعها فقد احتبس دونها
english_text: Zakat is a bridge of Islam. Whoever pays it has crossed the bridge, and whoever withholds it has been prevented from crossing

arabic_text: فضل العالم على العابد كفضل القمر ليلة البدر على سائر الكواكب
english_text: The virtue of the scholar over the worshipper is like the virtue of the moon on the night of the full moon over the rest of the stars

arabic_text: إن الشمس والقمر آيتان من آيات الله لا ينكسفان لموت أحد ولا لحياته فإذا رأيتم ذلك فصلوا
english_text: The sun and moon are two signs among the signs of Allah. They do not eclipse because of the death or life of anyone. When you see that, offer prayer
